q1.question: Can I change plans later?
q1.answer: Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

q2.question: Is there a free trial?
q2.answer: Yes! All plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start.

q3.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q3.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) via Stripe.

q4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
q4.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

q5.question: Do you offer refunds?
q5.answer: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you're not satisfied, contact us for a full refund.
